doc:
Ralph Camargo https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ralph_Camargo 0 Ralph Jaime Camargo (February 27, 1912 – January 15, 1992) was an American actor, best known for his work in theatre. He was also well known for being "the voice of Dynamic," narrating many short films in the 1950s and 1960s for the Firestone Tire and Rubber Company. Camargo was an actor in the soap opera Guiding Light in the era of old-time radio.His daughters are actresses Victoria Wyndham and Felice Camargo. His grandson is film and television actor Christian Camargo. Ralph_Jaime_Camargo ( February_27_,_1912 – January_15_,_1992 ) was an_American_actor , best_known for his_work in theatre . He was_also_well_known for being " the_voice of Dynamic , " narrating many_short_films in the_1950s_and_1960s for the_Firestone_Tire and Rubber_Company . Camargo was an_actor in the_soap_opera Guiding Light in the_era of old-time_radio.His_daughters are actresses_Victoria_Wyndham and Felice_Camargo . His_grandson is film_and_television_actor_Christian_Camargo .
